entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING ENDED, Ottawa (Richmond - Metcalfe)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:29 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 0.3°C

entry.title: Thursday night: A few showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain showers and freezing rain. Fog patches dissipating overnight. Wind east 30 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 9:57 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High plus 2 with temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early in the afternoon. High plus 2 with temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:57 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. A few flurries beginning early in the evening and ending after midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 9:57 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
